claimReward(bytes32,uint256,bytes32[]).details: The merkle proof must be valid for the competition's rootThe user must not have already claimed their reward

params.amount: The amount of BGT to claim
params.merkleRoot: The merkle root of the competition to claim from
params.proof: The merkle proof verifying the claim

createCompetition(bytes32,uint256).details: The reward amount must be available in earned rewards

params.merkleRoot: The merkle root of the competition
params.rewardAmount: The amount of BGT to allocate to the competition

returns._0: The amount of BGT that hasn't been allocated to any competition
The total amount of BGT earned

params.user: The address of the user to check

returns._0: Array of merkle roots the user has participated in

params.merkleRoot: The merkle root of the competition to check
params.user: The address of the user to check

returns._0: Whether the user has claimed their reward

initialize(address).details: Can only be called once, after reward vault is deployed

registerRewardVault(address).details: The reward vault must use the competition token as its staking tokenCan only be called once

params._rewardVault: The address of the reward vault to register

claimReward(bytes32,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Allows a user to claim their reward using a merkle proof

competitionToken().notice: The competition token used for staking

competitions(bytes32).notice: Maps merkle roots to their competition details

createCompetition(bytes32,uint256).notice: Creates a new competition with a merkle root and reward allocation

getAvailableBGT().notice: Returns the amount of BGT available for new competitions

getEarnedBGT().notice: Returns the total amount of BGT earned by this contract in the reward vault

getUserCompetitions(address).notice: Returns all merkle roots a user has participated in

hasUserClaimed(address,bytes32).notice: Returns whether a user has claimed their reward for a specific competition

initialize(address).notice: Initializes the contract by registering the reward vault and staking a competition token

initialized().notice: Whether the contract has been initialized

registerRewardVault(address).notice: Registers a reward vault to be used with this competition manager

rewardVault().notice: The RewardVault contract from Berachain that handles staking and rewards

totalAllocatedBGT().notice: Tracks the total amount of BGT allocated to competitions
